SageTVPlugin.Name: SageTV Groovy Tools
SageTVPlugin.Description: A series of Groovy tools and scripts that enhance the SageTV API.
SageTVPlugin.Author: Slugger
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
v1.0.4 ====== Fix extender power off on linux platforms
v1.0.3 ======
Add ability to power on, power off, reboot, and poll the state of media extender devices. These methods are in the GlobalHelpers class.
v1.0.2 ======
Add UtilityHelpers class
Reclassify plugin as a library plugin instead of a standard plugin
Add Groovy plugin dependency
v1.0.1 ======
Fix bug in EzRssFavorite where IOErrors were not being caught and causing scripts to terminate prematurely.
v1.0.0 ======
Initial release.
